ðŸ“– Summary: MLX-Audio is a library built on Apple's MLX framework that enables fast and efficient text-to-speech (TTS) and speech-to-speech (STS) generation, specifically optimized for Apple Silicon. It offers features like voice customization, adjustable speech speed, a web interface with 3D audio visualization, and a REST API for TTS generation.
